column1: The best holiday COVID plan I’ve seen so far. Imagine that -- Americans can think for themselves and make logical decisions based on common sense. I applaud you  @govkristinoem! 👏 https://t.co/NfU0uQm1eV

The Trump Administration turned a COVID vaccine around in record time. Give credit where credit is due. This is leadership.   Meanwhile all of Biden’s plans for combatting COVID are exactly the same as what President @realDonaldTrump is already doing.
Even though the media hates to admit it Trump’s COVID Task Force has been working hard—and the end is insight.   https://t.co/KXF3xIMRGr
The Right ran on freedom jobs and keeping our families safe.  The far Left ran on bike paths riots and fear surrounding COVID.
Coronavirus is no one’s fault but China’s. President Trump shut the border down ASAP. Beijing Biden and Queen Nancy called Trump a xenophobic racist.
Let’s look at the record. Biden’s handling of H1N1 vs Trump’s handling of Covid is a night and day difference. Biden didn’t lead through H1N1 and he can’t lead through Covid.

Gov. Parson contracted COVID and the media is insinuating it’s due to his mask policy. Meanwhile Gov. Northam — a huge supporter of mandatory masks —  tested positive for COVID and it’s no one’s fault. This media bias is divisive and outrageous.

The Pentagon is watching China closely. COVID-19 started there the People's Party knew it was dangerous our President acted quickly China's failures brought world economies to a screeching halt — and here they are meddling again. It's time to hold China accountable.
Incredible work from Missouri’s 4H members! Despite fundraising suspensions due to COVID-19 they’ve successfully raised over 250000 meals for those in need across our state.   https://t.co/Q0VydXdYBz
China reporting “0 new coronavirus cases” is as reliable as their first public statements about it. We cannot trust their reports. Period.

Missouri is sending a clear message - China owes us all for their lies and deceit over this disease. They need to be held accountable for covering up the truth about COVID-19 which led to its mass spread. https://t.co/bRsP1CzHVz

Our frontline heroes are working together to protect all Missourians from the spread of the coronavirus. Governor @mikeparson is the leader our state needs in this difficult time. From our home to yours stay safe. #MOTogether https://t.co/VzyWykkIEl

Let me be very clear: COVID-19 originated in the Chinese city Wuhan. Period. Full stop. Now a motley crew of bad actors (China Russia and Iran) are trying to say otherwise. Ridiculous.  https://t.co/IOK3xj9a93
It was great catching up with J98 to discuss what help is needed in rural America as the fight against coronavirus continues.  Listen to the full interview below ⬇️ https://t.co/K39yIe4csu

Trump and his team have been taking action since the moment the danger of COVID-19 came to light. It began by ending flights to and from infected areas and continued with guidance on health measures and lifting regulations holding back the FDA. 1/2

When Senators should have been coming together the Ds were playing politics. They pushed ludicrous measures that have absolutely nothing to do with COVID-19 relief & the MSM let them get away with it! Enough is enough. Pelosi Schumer & all you crooks - DO YOUR JOB.

We must never forget: China is a bad actor. They don't play be the same rules we do and they don't want to. Look at how they handled COVID-19 - in secrecy silencing most who dared to speak. China should have been transparent from the start. https://t.co/wswI8Wyr2D

As the impact of COVID-19 is felt throughout our nation and the world know that I am continuing to work for our farmers small businesses and families to ensure that we stay on our feet bounce back and recover even stronger than before.

Amid heightened concern over the spread of COVID-19 I encourage everyone to adhere to @CDCgov guidelines. Doing so will hopefully prevent further spread of the virus and we can return to normalcy sooner.  https://t.co/B6QmuNY1um
